message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.AI

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper proposes a novel blockchain-based MEC architecture that utilizes distributed computing resources at the edge of the network. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper focuses on improving the performance of mobile applications by providing computation and storage resources to mobile user equipments (UE) at the edge of the network. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper highlights the security benefits of blockchain technology, such as decentralization, immutability, and transparency. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) approach using a double deep Q-network (DQN) algorithm to solve the optimization problem. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper utilizes a machine learning approach (DRL) to optimize the joint scheme of computation offloading and blockchain mining.
